title: All-new Canyon Torque freeride bike hits bike parks with tons of slack alloy, carbon & mullet options
content:
Canyon has completely overhauled their Torque freeride bike for a new season of shredding bike parks, EWS tracks & jump lines with tons of options to suit any gravity rider. Pick from full carbon or alloy framesets and 27.5, 29â€³ or mullet wheel builds to get the perfect setup for your own personal style of
